alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 10:22PM CDT until September 24 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Cherokee County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Frankston, or 18 miles southeast of Athens, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Rusk, Bullard, Mount Selman, Ponta, Mixon, Reese, Maydelle, Lake Palestine, New Summerfield, Gallatin, Cuney, and Teaselville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
